sentence.Network_en: He also obtained similarity solutions for longitudinal and spherically symmetric motions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他也得出了关于纵向对称运动和球面对称运动的类似解.

sentence.Network_en: A spherically symmetric structure of the earth has been assumed.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们把地球的构造假设为球状对称.

sentence.Network_en: Hence a full subshell has zero angular momentum and is spherically symmetric.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是,一个已经填满的支壳层的角动量为零,并且是球面对称的.
